Viewing the Window Menu

The Window menu displays with all components, although certain options are not enabled for specific components. The options on the Window menu include:

Cascade

Arrange open windows so that they overlap but all their titles are visible.

Tile Horizontally

Arrange open windows horizontally without overlapping them.

Tile Vertically

Arrange the open windows vertically without overlapping them.

Arrange Icons

Order the icons for minimized windows.

Refresh

Refresh the contents of the project window.

Component Refresh

Refresh the contents of the upper pane without collapsing open groups of items. For example, if the File tab has been selected, this option refreshes the File list.

Component Refresh/Collapse

Refresh the contents of the upper pane and simultaneously collapse open groups of items.

Foreign Refresh

Refresh third-party projects or archives, such as Microsoft Visual SourceSafe projects and PVCS archive files.

Recent Views

Review list of the most recently accessed project view windows. A checkmark appears in front of the currently displayed window. To display a different window, click its name.
